TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Extensions extends System.Object
public ref class Extensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 此类包含 LINQ to XML 扩展方法，可以使用这些方法计算 XPath 表达式。

span.span: This class contains the LINQ to XML extension methods that enable you to evaluate XPath expressions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 没有为使用这些方法的某些性能产生负面影响。There is some performance penalty for using these methods. 使用[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)]查询产生更好的性能。Using [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](~/includes/sqltecxlinq-md.md)] queries yields better performance. 尽管 XML XPath 语言 1.0 建议中未指定返回的集合的顺序，但此扩展方法按文档顺序返回节点。Although the ordering of returned collections is not specified in the XML XPath Language 1.0 Recommendation, this extension method returns nodes in document order. 请注意，即使你使用反向轴，例如，节点将按文档顺序返回`preceding-sibling`或`ancestor-or-self`。Note that nodes are returned in document order even when you use a reverse axis, such as `preceding-sibling` or `ancestor-or-self`.

span.span: Creates an for an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你无法通过使用编辑 XML 树此方法返回。You cannot edit the XML tree by using the that is returned by this method. 属性返回 `false`。The property returns `false`. 无法创建为节点。You cannot create an for a node. 在 XPath 数据模型未参与文档类型。Document types do not participate in the XPath data model. 从左到右报告 Namespace 声明。Namespace declarations are reported from left to right. 相反，对于命名空间报告从右到左。In contrast, for namespaces are reported from right to left. 这是一致的行为，因为命名空间声明在 XPath 数据模型中不按顺序排列。This is conformant behavior because namespace declarations are not ordered in the XPath data model. 该方法不支持此方法返回的导航器。The method is not supported for navigators that are returned by this method. 此方法可用于执行 XSLT 转换。You can use this method to perform an XSLT transformation. 你可以创建 XML 树，创建从 XML 树中，创建一个新文档，并创建，以写入新文档。You can create an XML tree, create an from the XML tree, create a new document, and create a that will write into the new document. 然后，您可以调用 XSLT 转换，并可以将 和 传递到转换中。Then, you can invoke the XSLT transformation, passing the and to the transformation. 在转换成功完成后，使用转换的结果，填充新的 XML 树。After the transformation successfully completes, the new XML tree is populated with the results of the transformation. 若要执行 XSLT 转换，你可以使用或。To perform an XSLT transformation, you can use either an or an . 这两种方法具有不同的性能特征。The two approaches have different performance characteristics. 某些转换会在使用时更快地执行，并且其他人将执行更快地使用时。Some transformations will execute faster when using an , and others will execute faster when using a . 如果性能考虑，我们建议使用以确定将您的环境中更好地执行每种方法进行试验。If performance is a concern, we recommend that you experiment with each approach to determine which will perform better in your circumstances. ```csharp string xslMarkup = @" "; XDocument xmlTree = new XDocument( new XElement("Parent", new XElement("Child1", "Child1 data"), new XElement("Child2", "Child2 data") ) ); XDocument newTree = new XDocument(); using (XmlWriter writer = newTree.CreateWriter()) { // Load the style sheet. XslCompiledTransform xslt = new XslCompiledTransform(); xslt.Load(XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xslMarkup))); // Execute the transform and output the results to a writer. xslt.Transform(xmlTree.CreateNavigator(), writer); } Console.WriteLine(newTree); ``` ```vb Dim xslMarkup As XDocument = Dim xmlTree As XDocument = Child1 data Child2 data Dim newTree As XDocument = New XDocument() Using writer As XmlWriter = newTree.CreateWriter() ' Load the style sheet. Dim xslt As XslCompiledTransform = _ New XslCompiledTransform() xslt.Load(xslMarkup.CreateReader()) ' Execute the transform and output the results to a writer. xslt.Transform(xmlTree.CreateNavigator(), writer) End Using Console.WriteLine(newTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Child1 data Child2 data ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你无法通过使用编辑 XML 树此方法返回。You cannot edit the XML tree by using the that is returned by this method. 属性返回 `false`。The property returns `false`. 无法创建为节点。You cannot create an for a node. 在 XPath 数据模型未参与文档类型。Document types do not participate in the XPath data model. 从左到右报告 Namespace 声明。Namespace declarations are reported from left to right. 相反，对于命名空间报告从右到左。In contrast, for namespaces are reported from right to left. 这是一致的行为，因为命名空间声明在 XPath 数据模型中不按顺序排列。This is conformant behavior because namespace declarations are not ordered in the XPath data model. 该方法不支持此方法返回的导航器。The method is not supported for navigators that are returned by this method. 此方法可用于执行 XSLT 转换。You can use this method to perform an XSLT transformation. 你可以创建 XML 树，创建从 XML 树中，创建一个新文档，并创建，以写入新文档。You can create an XML tree, create an from the XML tree, create a new document, and create a that will write into the new document. 然后，可以调用 XSLT 转换，传入和的转换。Then, you can invoke the XSLT transformation, passing the and to the transform. 在转换成功完成后，使用转换的结果，填充新的 XML 树。After the transformation successfully completes, the new XML tree is populated with the results of the transformation. 若要执行 XSLT 转换，你可以使用或。To perform an XSLT transformation, you can use either an or an . 这两种方法具有不同的性能特征。The two approaches have different performance characteristics. 某些转换会在使用时更快地执行，并且其他人将执行更快地使用时。Some transformations will execute faster when using an , and others will execute faster when using a . 如果性能考虑，我们建议使用以确定将您的环境中更好地执行每种方法进行试验。If performance is a concern, we recommend that you experiment with each approach to determine which will perform better in your circumstances. ## Examples ```csharp string xslMarkup = @" "; XDocument xmlTree = new XDocument( new XElement("Parent", new XElement("Child1", "Child1 data"), new XElement("Child2", "Child2 data") ) ); XDocument newTree = new XDocument(); using (XmlWriter writer = newTree.CreateWriter()) { // Load the style sheet. XslCompiledTransform xslt = new XslCompiledTransform(); xslt.Load(XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xslMarkup))); // Execute the transform and output the results to a writer. xslt.Transform(xmlTree.CreateNavigator(), writer); } Console.WriteLine(newTree); ``` ```vb Dim xslMarkup As XDocument = _ Dim xmlTree As XDocument = _ Child1 data Child2 data Dim newTree As XDocument = New XDocument() Using writer As XmlWriter = newTree.CreateWriter() ' Load the style sheet. Dim xslt As XslCompiledTransform = _ New XslCompiledTransform() xslt.Load(xslMarkup.CreateReader()) ' Execute the transform and output the results to a writer. xslt.Transform(xmlTree.CreateNavigator(), writer) End Using Console.WriteLine(newTree) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ```xml Child1 data Child2 data ```

summary.span: 可以使 XPath 表达式的处理变得更高效。

span.span: The enables more efficient XPath expression processing.

returns.span: 一个可以处理 XPath 查询的 。

span.span: An that can process XPath queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法编辑 XML 树使用此方法返回。You cannot edit the XML tree using the that is returned by this method. 属性返回 `false`。The property returns `false`. 无法创建为节点。You cannot create an for a node. 在 XPath 数据模型未参与文档类型。Document types do not participate in the XPath data model. 从左到右报告 Namespace 声明。Namespace declarations are reported from left to right. 相反，对于命名空间报告从右到左。In contrast, for namespaces are reported from right to left. 这是一致的行为，因为命名空间声明在 XPath 数据模型中不按顺序排列。This is conformant behavior because namespace declarations are not ordered in the XPath data model. 该方法不支持此方法返回的导航器。The method is not supported for navigators that are returned by this method. 如果你使用使用此方法以创建，计算 XPath 表达式时，将获得更好的性能。If you use an with this method to create the , you will get better performance when evaluating XPath expressions.

span.span: Evaluates an XPath expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 XML XPath 语言 1.0 建议中未指定返回的集合的顺序，但此扩展方法按文档顺序返回节点。Although the ordering of returned collections is not specified in the XML XPath Language 1.0 Recommendation, this extension method returns nodes in document order. 请注意，即使你使用反向轴，例如，节点将按文档顺序返回`preceding-sibling`或`ancestor-or-self`。Note that nodes are returned in document order even when you use a reverse axis, such as `preceding-sibling` or `ancestor-or-self`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object XPathEvaluate (this System.Xml.Linq.XNode node, string expression);
.method public static hidebysig object XPathEvaluate(class System.Xml.Linq.XNode node, string expression) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function XPathEvaluate (node As XNode, expression As String) As Object

param.name: node
param.span: 一个 ，XPath 表达式将在其上计算。

span.span: The on which to evaluate the XPath expression.

param.name: expression
param.span: 一个包含 XPath 表达式的 。

span.span: A that contains an XPath expression.
Evaluates an XPath expression.

returns.span: 一个可以包含 、、 或 的对象。

span.span: An object that can contain a , a , a , or an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合是元素或属性的一个枚举，则可以使用`Cast`运算符来获取的集合或。If the collection is an enumeration of elements or attributes, you can use the `Cast` operator to get a collection of or . 尽管 XML XPath 语言 1.0 建议中未指定返回的集合的顺序，但此扩展方法按文档顺序返回节点。Although the ordering of returned collections is not specified in the XML XPath Language 1.0 Recommendation, this extension method returns nodes in document order. 请注意，即使你使用反向轴，例如，节点将按文档顺序返回`preceding-sibling`或`ancestor-or-self`。Note that nodes are returned in document order even when you use a reverse axis, such as `preceding-sibling` or `ancestor-or-self`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个小型 XML 树具有一个属性，然后使用方法来检索该属性。The following example creates a small XML tree with an attribute, then uses the method to retrieve the attribute. ```csharp String xml = ""; XDocument d = XDocument.Parse(xml); IEnumerable att = (IEnumerable)d.XPathEvaluate("/root/@a"); Console.WriteLine(att.Cast().FirstOrDefault()); ``` ```vb Dim d As XDocument = _ Dim att As IEnumerable = CType(d.XPathEvaluate("/root/@a"), IEnumerable) Console.WriteLine(att.Cast(Of XAttribute)().FirstOrDefault()) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` a="value" ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static object XPathEvaluate (this System.Xml.Linq.XNode node, string expression, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver resolver);
.method public static hidebysig object XPathEvaluate(class System.Xml.Linq.XNode node, string expression, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver resolver) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function XPathEvaluate (node As XNode, expression As String, resolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver) As Object

param.name: node
param.span: 一个 ，XPath 表达式将在其上计算。

span.span: The on which to evaluate the XPath expression.

param.name: expression
param.span: 一个包含 XPath 表达式的 。

span.span: A that contains an XPath expression.

param.name: resolver
param.span: 一个用于解析 XPath 表达式中命名空间前缀的 。

span.span: A for the namespace prefixes in the XPath expression.

summary.span: 计算 XPath 表达式，使用指定的 解析命名空间前缀。

span.span: Evaluates an XPath expression, resolving namespace prefixes using the specified .

returns.span: 一个包含表达式计算结果的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the result of evaluating the expression.
The object can be a , a , a , or an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于计算 XPath 表达式包含命名空间前缀。You can use this method to evaluate XPath expressions that contain namespace prefixes. 尽管 XML XPath 语言 1.0 建议中未指定返回的集合的顺序，但此扩展方法按文档顺序返回节点。Although the ordering of returned collections is not specified in the XML XPath Language 1.0 Recommendation, this extension method returns nodes in document order. 请注意，即使你使用反向轴，例如，节点将按文档顺序返回`preceding-sibling`或`ancestor-or-self`。Note that nodes are returned in document order even when you use a reverse axis, such as `preceding-sibling` or `ancestor-or-self`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含命名空间的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree that contains a namespace. 它使用 来读取 XML 文档。It uses an to read the XML document. 然后获取 中的 和 中的 。It then gets an from the , and an from the . 它使用选择某个元素时。It uses the when selecting an element. ```csharp string markup = @" child one data 1 "; XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup)); XElement root = XElement.Load(reader); XmlNameTable nameTable = reader.NameTable; XmlNamespaceManager namespaceManager = new XmlNamespaceManager(nameTable); namespaceManager.AddNamespace("aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"); IEnumerable atts = (IEnumerable)root.XPathEvaluate("./aw:Child1/@aw:Att", namespaceManager); IEnumerable attList = atts.Cast(); XAttribute att = attList.First(); Console.WriteLine(att); ``` ```vb Dim markup As XElement = _ child one data 1 Dim reader As XmlReader = markup.CreateReader Dim nameTable As XmlNameTable = reader.NameTable Dim namespaceManager As XmlNamespaceManager = New XmlNamespaceManager(nameTable) namespaceManager.AddNamespace("aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com") Dim atts As IEnumerable = CType(markup.XPathEvaluate("./aw:Child1/@aw:Att", namespaceManager), IEnumerable) Dim attList As IEnumerable(Of XAttribute) = atts.Cast(Of XAttribute)() Dim att As XAttribute = attList.First() Console.WriteLine(att) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` aw:Att="attdata" ```

summary.span: 使用 XPath 表达式选择 。

span.span: Selects an using a XPath expression.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Xml.Linq.XElement XPathSelectElement (this System.Xml.Linq.XNode node, string expression);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Xml.Linq.XElement XPathSelectElement(class System.Xml.Linq.XNode node, string expression) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function XPathSelectElement (node As XNode, expression As String) As XElement

param.name: node
param.span: 一个 ，XPath 表达式将在其上计算。

span.span: The on which to evaluate the XPath expression.

param.name: expression
param.span: 一个包含 XPath 表达式的 。

span.span: A that contains an XPath expression.

summary.span: 使用 XPath 表达式选择 。

span.span: Selects an using a XPath expression.
An , or null.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个小型 XML 树，并使用选择单个元素。The following example creates a small XML tree and uses to select a single element. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child2", 2), new XElement("Child3", 3), new XElement("Child4", 4), new XElement("Child5", 5), new XElement("Child6", 6) ); XElement el = root.XPathSelectElement("./Child4"); Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim el As XElement = root.XPathSelectElement("./Child4") Console.WriteLine(el) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 4 ```

param.name: expression
param.span: 一个包含 XPath 表达式的 。

param.span: 一个用于解析 XPath 表达式中命名空间前缀的 。

span.span: An for the namespace prefixes in the XPath expression.

summary.span: 使用 XPath 表达式选择 ，并使用指定的 解析命名空间前缀。

span.span: Selects an using a XPath expression, resolving namespace prefixes using the specified .
An , or null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于计算 XPath 表达式包含命名空间前缀。You can use this method to evaluate XPath expressions that contain namespace prefixes. ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含命名空间的 XML 树。The following example creates an XML tree that contains a namespace. 它使用 来读取 XML 文档。It uses an to read the XML document. 然后获取 中的 和 中的 。It then gets an from the , and an from the . 它使用选择某个元素时。It uses the when selecting an element. ```csharp string markup = @" child one data child two data "; XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup)); XElement root = XElement.Load(reader); XmlNameTable nameTable = reader.NameTable; XmlNamespaceManager namespaceManager = new XmlNamespaceManager(nameTable); namespaceManager.AddNamespace("aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"); XElement child1 = root.XPathSelectElement("./aw:Child1", namespaceManager); Console.WriteLine(child1); ``` ```vb Dim markup As XElement = _ child one data child two data Dim reader As XmlReader = markup.CreateReader Dim nameTable As XmlNameTable = reader.NameTable Dim namespaceManager As XmlNamespaceManager = New XmlNamespaceManager(nameTable) namespaceManager.AddNamespace("aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com") Dim child1 As XElement = markup.XPathSelectElement("./aw:Child1", namespaceManager) Console.WriteLine(child1) ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` child one data ```

summary.span: 使用 XPath 表达式选择一个元素集合。

span.span: Selects a collection of elements using an XPath expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 XML XPath 语言 1.0 建议中未指定返回的集合的顺序，但此扩展方法按文档顺序返回节点。Although the ordering of returned collections is not specified in the XML XPath Language 1.0 Recommendation, this extension method returns nodes in document order. 请注意，即使你使用反向轴，例如，节点将按文档顺序返回`preceding-sibling`或`ancestor-or-self`。Note that nodes are returned in document order even when you use a reverse axis, such as `preceding-sibling` or `ancestor-or-self`.

<Extension()> Public Function XPathSelectElements (node As XNode, expression As String) As IEnumerable(Of XElement)

param.name: node
param.span: 一个 ，XPath 表达式将在其上计算。

span.span: The on which to evaluate the XPath expression.

param.name: expression
param.span: 一个包含 XPath 表达式的 。

span.span: A that contains an XPath expression.

summary.span: 使用 XPath 表达式选择一个元素集合。

span.span: Selects a collection of elements using an XPath expression.

returns.span: 一个 的 ，它包含选定元素。

span.span: An of that contains the selected elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 XML XPath 语言 1.0 建议中未指定返回的集合的顺序，但此扩展方法按文档顺序返回节点。Although the ordering of returned collections is not specified in the XML XPath Language 1.0 Recommendation, this extension method returns nodes in document order. 请注意，即使你使用反向轴，例如，节点将按文档顺序返回`preceding-sibling`或`ancestor-or-self`。Note that nodes are returned in document order even when you use a reverse axis, such as `preceding-sibling` or `ancestor-or-self`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个小型 XML 树，并使用 选择一组元素。The following example creates a small XML tree and uses to select a set of elements. ```csharp XElement root = new XElement("Root", new XElement("Child1", 1), new XElement("Child1", 2), new XElement("Child1", 3), new XElement("Child2", 4), new XElement("Child2", 5), new XElement("Child2", 6) ); IEnumerable list = root.XPathSelectElements("./Child2"); foreach (XElement el in list) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim root As XElement = _ 1 2 3 4 5 6 Dim list As IEnumerable(Of XElement) = root.XPathSelectElements("./Child2") For Each el As XElement In list Console.WriteLine(el) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` 4 5 6 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于计算 XPath 表达式包含命名空间前缀。You can use this method to evaluate XPath expressions that contain namespace prefixes. 尽管 XML XPath 语言 1.0 建议中未指定返回的集合的顺序，但此扩展方法按文档顺序返回节点。Although the ordering of returned collections is not specified in the XML XPath Language 1.0 Recommendation, this extension method returns nodes in document order. 请注意，即使你使用反向轴，例如，节点将按文档顺序返回`preceding-sibling`或`ancestor-or-self`。Note that nodes are returned in document order even when you use a reverse axis, such as `preceding-sibling` or `ancestor-or-self`. ## Examples 此示例创建包含命名空间的 XML 树。This example creates an XML tree that contains a namespace. 它使用 来读取 XML 文档。It uses an to read the XML document. 然后获取 中的 和 中的 。It then gets an from the , and an from the . 它使用时选择的元素的列表。It uses the when selecting the list of elements. ```csharp string markup = @" child one data 1 child one data 2 child one data 3 child two data 4 child two data 5 child two data 6 "; XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(markup)); XElement root = XElement.Load(reader); XmlNameTable nameTable = reader.NameTable; XmlNamespaceManager namespaceManager = new XmlNamespaceManager(nameTable); namespaceManager.AddNamespace("aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com"); IEnumerable elements = root.XPathSelectElements("./aw:Child1", namespaceManager); foreach (XElement el in elements) Console.WriteLine(el); ``` ```vb Dim markup As XElement = _ child one data 1 child one data 2 child one data 3 child two data 4 child two data 5 child two data 6 Dim reader As XmlReader = markup.CreateReader Dim nameTable As XmlNameTable = reader.NameTable Dim namespaceManager As XmlNamespaceManager = New XmlNamespaceManager(nameTable) namespaceManager.AddNamespace("aw", "http://www.adventure-works.com") Dim elements As IEnumerable(Of XElement) = markup.XPathSelectElements("./aw:Child1", namespaceManager) For Each el As XElement In elements Console.WriteLine(el) Next ``` 该示例产生下面的输出：This example produces the following output: ``` child one data 1 child one data 2 child one data 3 ```
